NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
YARROW: Is everyone ready? The test will soon begin!
2
1
PYE: Our apologies for our tardiness, Yarrow. Idaea and I were lost on our way, before Poke found us!
3 1
IDAEA: Yarrow, a memory statue aboard the <color=orange>Sun Station</color> paired with me just now. Does this mean that the project.. succeeded?
4 3
YARROW: I am glad to hear from you at last, my friends. But.. No, I'm afraid the <color=lightblue>Eye of the Universe</color> continues to elude us.
5 4
YARROW: Though our friends predicted as much, I cannot hide our disappointment that the <color=orange>Deep Storm Station</color> was unable to locate the <color=lightblue>Eye of the Universe.</color>
6 5
YARROW: The memory statues were only activated after it had elapsed 20 billion loops, and began to detect redundant trajectories.
7 6
IDAEA: But Yarrow, the <color=orange>Deep Storm Station</color> still succeeded: thanks to the test, we can now be certain that the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project's</color> mechanisms are theoretically sound and functional.
8 7
PYE: Idaea is correct, Yarrow! Once the <color=orange>Sun Station</color> is complete, we can now be confident in its operation without fear.
SS EX1 1
SS EX2 8
SS CONV1 8
